message: Major sporting events have become synonymous with the sex trade. "These individuals feel it's an opportunity to exploit people," said expert Chuck Paul. "They want to get people away from the event and they want to sell human beings for sex."

data.description: SAN ANTONIO - It's no secret, the sex trafficking industry spikes during major sporting events.Now that the final four is just days away local, state, and federal police are working together to fight human trafficking.Basketball fans near and far are excit
data.title: Final Four: Authorities roll out sex trafficking prevention plan
